name: Near Site
description:
WASD to move, mouse to look, tab for settings.....that's it!

So you find yourself stuck on a floating rock over a volcano, defenseless, hunted by a hover-bot you can't kill, AND you're super near sighted? Better be sneaky and do your best to find clues on how to escape without being slain. If only you had a pair of glasses....even then, I can only imagine how fragile they are...
